div.span: Governor Murphy issued on March 16, 2020 Executive Order No. 104 that “All public, private, and parochial preschool program premises, and elementary and secondary schools, including charter and renaissance schools, shall be closed to students beginning Wednesday, March 18, 2020, and shall remain closed as long as this Order remains in effect.” Therefore, the Ocean City School District is closed until further notice. Additional school updates will be provided as they become available.
